name: guild
description: Allows you to dynamically change the command

options.name: rule
options.description: Manage the rules in the guild

options.name: add
options.description: Add a new rule to the guild

options.name: number
options.description: Where to place the rule (use decimals to place it between existing rule numbers)

options.name: short
options.description: A brief summary of the rule

options.name: long
options.description: A deeper explanation of the rule

options.name: delete
options.description: Delete a existing rule from the guild

options.name: modify
options.description: Modify a existing rule in the guild

options.name: number
options.description: Where to place the rule (use decimals to place it between existing rule numbers)

options.name: short
options.description: A brief summary of the rule

options.name: long
options.description: A deeper explanation of the rule
